marytts.htsengine

Class HTSPStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • marytts.htsengine.HTSPStream

  • public class HTSPStream
extends Object
    Data type and procedures used in parameter generation. Contains means and variances of a particular model, mcep pdfs for a particular phone for example. It also contains auxiliar matrices used in maximum likelihood parameter generation. Java port and extension of HTS engine version 2.0 and GV from HTS version 2.1alpha. Extension: mixed excitation
    Author:
    Marcela Charfuelan
